a:entry.a:title: Lynx Twist - Keeping Keeley
a:entry.reducedDescription: To celebrate the launch of new Lynx Twist, the fragrance that changes, Lynx has taken its first foray into film production with the sexy comedy ‘Keeping Keeley’. Insight from Lynx HQ has shown that girls are increasingly looking for guys who keep them interested. This interactive film is specifically designed to test guys’ skills at holding girls’ attention during crucial mating game moments. a:entry.fullDescription: To celebrate the launch of new Lynx Twist, the fragrance that changes, Lynx has taken its first foray into film production with the sexy comedy ‘Keeping Keeley’. Insight from Lynx HQ has shown that girls are increasingly looking for guys who keep them interested. This interactive film is specifically designed to test guys’ skills at holding girls’ attention during crucial mating game moments. The film features a stellar cast of up and coming UK talent including: the eponymous Keeley Hazell, Blake Harrison (Neil from The Inbetweeners), Mike Fielding (Naboo from The Mighty Boosh) and the Scarlet Harlots (T4’s Orange Unsigned Acts).
